name: Chained Cars Drag Challenge 3D
description:
Are you a car junkie? Do you love driving cars on the most difficult tracks in impossible driving conditions? Than Chained Cars Drag Challenge 3D is the game for you.
Drive your car in a difficult track but track isn't the only problem. You will be attached to a companion car AI. You task is to not let the chain get destroyed. Maintain a proper distance from the the other car. If the chain stretches & breaks both of the cars will detonate an explosion which will destroy both cars. So patience & car control is the key to complete the levels.
So are you up for the most difficult drive of your life? Lets go!

Game Attractions:

1) Realistic Car Soft Body Physics
2) Intelligent Companion Car AI
3) Highly Defined 3D Environment & Graphics
4) Variety of Car Pairs to Choose
